EmailTemplate.description: Email to Case - Copy of Email of acknowledgement for demographic change request
EmailTemplate.name: Email To Case BCBSIL Copy Acknowledgement
EmailTemplate.subject: BCBS of Illinois Demographic Change Request Form Received ref: {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Submitter,
Thank you for contacting Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Illinois. This email is confirmation we have received your request, case number {!Case.CaseNumber}, Your request may take up to 30 days to complete. Once completed, a notification will be sent to the email address submitted with the Demographic Change Request Form.
To check on the status of your request or for any questions, contact "Netops_Provider_Update@bcbsil.com".
ref: {!Case.Thread_Id}
Sincerely,
Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Illinois
